message: Let's start with a fair split. Accept and we can end the game.
You can do better than that, let's negotiate!
That's a pretty lopsided offer. I'm not willing to give you 7,000. I'll make a new offer.
A 50/50 split is a fair and reasonable offer. Let's meet in the middle.
You're getting close, but I'm not giving up that much yet!
That's still a pretty uneven split. I'm not willing to give you 8,000. I'll try to make a new offer that's even more balanced.
I'm trying to find a balance. This offer gives you a slight edge, but I'm still getting a decent amount.
You're getting desperate, I can sense it. Don't make it that obvious!
You're right, I'm not desperate. I'm just trying to get a fair deal. This offer is still way too one-sided. I'll make a new offer that shows I'm not giving up yet.
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I'm not going to give up my fair share. This is a reasonable compromise.
You're really low-balling me now. Don't expect me to accept such a lopsided deal!
I'm not trying to low-ball you, I'm trying to find a fair deal. This offer is ridiculous. I'll make a new offer that shows I'm willing to meet you halfway, but not give away the farm.
I'm trying to find a middle ground. This offer is closer to a 50/50 split, but still gives you a slight edge.
